entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 8 May 2023
